item.title: Making change slayertask option thanks!

item.description:
@weed4u wrote:

i want to add a change slayertask option and someone told me to add

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("resettask")) { taskID = 0; sM("Slayer Task reset!"); }

i know it says taskID its thats the variable or whatever but anywaysâ€¦

i dont actually change it i just think it resets it because when i talk to the guy to try to get a new one i get the same thing any help?

i dont care if its a command or talking to the npc. just for now i rather have a command. thanks!

Read full topic
